question: Who among the following won Dnyaneshwara World Peace Prize 2019 in the event of 5th World Parliament of science, religion and philosophy?
explanation: Dr. Karan Singh (Former union minister) won Dnyaneshwara World Peace Prize 2019 in the event of the 5th World Parliament of science, religion and philosophy. The Governor of Kerala Shri. Arif Mohammad Khan conferred this award to him.
